entry.title: dotnet/runtime - Issues & Pull Requests - 2023-04-21
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • More precise dependency analysis for generic dictionaries #85184
  • missing help for some SYSLIBxxx The specified 'MarshalAsAttribute' configuration for param ... #85181
  • Deserialising null to JsonNode in nested structures fails in System.Text.Json #85172
    Future
  • CoreCLR tests build fails with `skipmanaged` option #85170
  • [wasm] DebuggerTests.EvaluateOnCallFrameTests timeouts on CI #85168
    8.0.0
  • [mono] Fuse Vector128.WithElement and Vector128.GetElement on arm64 #85166
    Future
  • [API Proposal]: System.DataUri #85164
  • NativeAOT difference in behavior to ILLink with descriptor preserved code and constant propagation #85161
  • how can I run runtime tests with monovm on ios? #85160
  • System.Reflection.Assembly.GetExportedTypes() throws StackOverflowException. #85159
  • Warning for ArgumentNullException.ThrowIfNull when passing a struct #85154
  • [API Proposal]: APIs for working with unix file types #85148
  • Dotnet publish command creates publish folder locally but not in the Azure pipelines. #85147
  • Managed type system casting logic doesn't handle all array variance #85146
    8.0.0
  • [wasm] System.Collections.Tests Unimplemented opcode 2428 .i2 #85145
    8.0.0
  • NativeAOT ComWrappers: support IReferenceTrackerHost #85137
    8.0.0
  • Vector256.Shuffle() returns incorrect result when index is out of bounds #85132

Closed

  • New rule reliability/maintainability: Do await incomplete Tasks before returning and implicitly running other code #85175
  • [libraries-jitstress-random] Assertion failed 'bad 8 byte op' #85058
    8.0.0
  • Test failure Loader\\classloader\\TypeInitialization\\CctorsWithSideEffects\\CctorForWrite\\CctorForWrite.cmd #84007
    8.0.0
  • The Jit will sometimes drop side-effecting unused addresses #84522
    8.0.0
  • The ConvertName function in JsonSeparatorNamingPolicy doesn't handle null value #84830
    8.0.0
  • [JitStress] Assertion failed 'genActualType(type) == type' #85121
    8.0.0
  • [NixOS] ping utility not found #83649
    8.0.0
  • XmlSerializer formatter = new XmlSerializer(typeof(List<T>)) throws exception #85142
  • Unpin C# compiler version for repo #65317
    7.0.x
  • [Proposal] Allow a Brotli compression level between Fastest and Optimal #85138
  • System.Net.Http.Enterprise.Tests build failing in CI #85035
    8.0.0
  • Test failure JIT/Regression/JitBlue/Runtime_56953/Runtime_56953/Runtime_56953.cmd #85135
  • [NativeAOT] System.NotSupportedException: DelegateMarshalling_MissingInteropData in Marshal.StructureToPtr #85086
  • [wasm] WasmBuildTests NativeBuild_WithDeployOnBuild_UsedByVS is failing and will be disabled #84722
    8.0.0
  • Is vxsort with workstation GC a common scenario? #84749

PullRequests

Created

  • Disable gcstress and jitstress for tracing tests #85186
    area-Tracing-coreclr, 8.0.0
  • Use unique IL assembly names instead of automatic renaming #85185
    test-enhancement
  • Fix XUnit Log Fixer Irregularities #85183
    area-Infrastructure-coreclr, 8.0.0
  • [mono] Add metadata update for overrides #85182
    area-VM-meta-mono
  • Split assignment rationalization into a separate phase #85180
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, community-contribution
  • Update llvm-libunwind to v16.0.2 #85179
    community-contribution, area-NativeAOT-coreclr, needs-area-label
  • Remove references to P/Invokes and DllImport from resource strings in ComInterfaceGenerator #85178
    area-System.Runtime.InteropServices, source-generator, 8.0.0
  • [mono] refactor metadata update code #85177
    area-VM-meta-mono
  • Fix generic recursion condition when calling DeserializeAsyncEnumerable in NativeAOT. #85176
    area-System.Text.Json, new-api-needs-documentation, size-reduction, 8.0.0
  • Shared Readme: expand the section on GH Actions #85173
    area-System.Net.Http
  • JIT: use blend rather then repair for profile inconsistencies #85171
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • [wasm] System.Net.WebSockets.Client.Tests timeouts #85167
    arch-wasm, area-System.Runtime.InteropServices.JavaScript, 8.0.0
  • Remove common tests from the Roslyn3.11 test project. #85165
    area-System.Text.Json, 8.0.0
  • [mono][jit] Adding Vector128.ConvertXX as intrinsic on arm64. #85163
    area-Codegen-JIT-mono, 8.0.0
  • Drain ConsoleLogProcessor on Dispose #85162
    area-Extensions-Logging
  • [mono][jit] Add Vector128.WithElement as intrinsic on arm64. #85158
    area-Codegen-JIT-mono, 8.0.0
  • Bugfix/30024 problem with concurrency type descriptor getconverter #85156
    area-System.ComponentModel, community-contribution
  • [mono][interp] Fix arg alignment issues when mixing with compiled code #85153
    area-Codegen-Interpreter-mono
  • [mono][wasm][aot] Prevent llvm from optimizing away stack stores of valuetypes containing object references when they are returned from a method as a scalar. #85152
    area-Codegen-LLVM-mono
  • Templatize `enregisterLocalVars` in various methods of LSRA #85144
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • Missing overrides in LoggingHttpMessageHandler and LoggingScopeHttpMessageHandler #85143
    area-Extensions-HttpClientFactory, community-contribution
  • [LoongArch64] fix the errors for mod/div after #82924. #85140
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, community-contribution
  • Enable `StripSymbols` by default #85139
    breaking-change, needs-breaking-change-doc-created, area-NativeAOT-coreclr
  • Add options to optimize for size/speed #85133
    area-NativeAOT-coreclr

Merged

  • [browser] Enable webcil in Wasm SDK #84977
    arch-wasm, area-Build-mono, 8.0.0
  • Ensure ins_Copy, ins_Load, ins_Move, and ins_Store all handle TYP_MASK #85110
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, arch-avx512
  • Fix type initialization ordering under R2R #84275
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, area-crossgen2-coreclr
  • Inline function pointer composition details into MethodTable #85141
    area-NativeAOT-coreclr
  • Fix some issues with null check handling #84523
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, community-contribution
  • Avoid null ref in JsonSeparatorNamingPolicy #85002
    area-System.Text.Json, 8.0.0
  • [wasm][debugger] ActiveIssue for DebuggerTests.EvaluateOnCallFrameTests timeouts #85169
    arch-wasm, area-Debugger-mono, 8.0.0
  • Zlib: Add some protections to the allocator used by zlib #84604
    area-System.IO.Compression
  • add nixos ping executable path #84997
    area-System.Net, community-contribution
  • Use `genActualType` in `LowerSwitch` #85122
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, community-contribution
  • [LoongArch64] fix the arg regs' loop depending. #85085
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, community-contribution, arch-loongarch64
  • [LoongArch64] revert TARGET_LOONGARCH64 which destroyed by RISCV#84584. #85151
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, community-contribution
  • Fix enterprise linux build #84795
    area-System.Net.Security
  • Add NativeAOT runtime pack build for iOS/tvOS/Catalyst #85047
    area-Infrastructure-installer
  • Backport #78136 to .NET 7 #84936
    Servicing-approved, tenet-performance, area-System.Runtime.InteropServices.JavaScript, source-generator, 7.0.7
  • NativeAOT ComWrappers: extend managed object lifetime based on refcount #85087
    community-contribution, area-NativeAOT-coreclr
  • Sync shared code from aspnetcore #85149
    area-System.Net.Http
  • [JIT] ARM64 - Combine 'neg' and 'cmp' to 'cmn' #84667
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • Keep instrumentings some intrinsics #85130
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • [browser][non-icu] `HybridGlobalization` update string decoding for comparison #85098
    arch-wasm, area-System.Globalization
  • [wasm-mt] A version of LowLevelLifoSemaphore that uses callbacks on the browser #84491
    arch-wasm, area-VM-threading-mono
  • Try to untangle the rid calculation. #82832
    community-contribution
  • Fix reproNative project #85150
    area-NativeAOT-coreclr
  • Unsubscribe from codegen-coreclr notifications #85124
    area-Meta
  • [wasm] WBT: Re-enable previously disabled test #85009
    arch-wasm, area-Build-mono
  • Block Runtime_84693 with the issue #85081 #85123
    area-Infrastructure-coreclr
  • [wasm] Detect constant-size cpblk copies in the jiterpreter and unroll them #85125
    arch-wasm, area-Codegen-Jiterpreter-mono
  • Lowering Vector512() methods : comparison + shift #84942
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, arch-avx512
  • Jettison vxsort support in the GC when optimizing for size #85036
    area-NativeAOT-coreclr

Updated

  • Support non core types for signature and other type references #85112
    area-System.Reflection.Emit
  • Adding Shuffle(). #85129
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, community-contribution, arch-avx512
  • [ios][wasm] Bump to ICU-72 #84849
    NO-MERGE, area-Build-mono
  • Report -1 for GC.GetGeneration(nongc_obj) and same for GetObjectGeneration #85017
    breaking-change, area-Diagnostics-coreclr, needs-breaking-change-doc-created
  • [browser] Enable threads in Wasm SDK #85109
    arch-wasm, area-Build-mono, 8.0.0
  • Fix GCStress timeouts in JIT/jit64 #85040
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • Fold IND(frozenObj, CNS) #85127
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • Optimize GDV checks for objects with known type #84661
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • Avx512: Abs, ceil, floor, min, max #84937
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, arch-avx512
  • Use emit-based invoke for all of WASM including DI #85065
    arch-wasm, area-System.Reflection, tenet-performance, 8.0.0
  • Add a test for `STORE_DYN_BLK(..., IND(null), ...)` #85103
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, community-contribution
  • Use `gtNewIndir` everywhere #84528
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, community-contribution
  • Introduction to vectorization with Vector128 and Vector256 #84115
    area-Meta
  • [HTTP/3] Stress hack for msquic dropping connections #84793
    area-System.Net.Http
  • Enable EVEX feature: embedded broadcast for Vector256.Add() in limited cases #84821
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, community-contribution, arch-avx512
  • [mono][debugger] Improving debugger functionaties #85050
    area-Debugger-mono
  • [Arm64] Replace pairs of `str` with `stp` #85032
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • NoGCRegion Callback #82045
    area-GC-coreclr, new-api-needs-documentation
  • [MONO] Add JIT_CODE_DEBUG_INFO record functionality for Jitdump #85107
    area-Codegen-JIT-mono, community-contribution
  • Ascii.Equals and Ascii.EqualsIgnoreCase #84886
    area-System.Text.Encoding, new-api-needs-documentation
  • Use Roslyn Source Generator Testing SDK to test interop source generators #84867
    area-System.Runtime.InteropServices, test-enhancement, source-generator
  • Improve allocations in ReflectionXmlSerializationWriter when serializing primitive types #84474
    area-Serialization, new-api-needs-documentation, community-contribution
  • Interface inheritance follow up #85117
    area-System.Runtime.InteropServices
  • Enable ComWrappers for NativeAOT on non-Windows #85000
    area-NativeAOT-coreclr
  • Address Sanitizer support in CoreCLR #74623
    tenet-reliability, area-Infrastructure
  • The ConstructorBuilder and MethodBuilder generated parameter should not has default value by default #84550
    area-System.Reflection.Emit, community-contribution
  • [wasm] Use latest stable version of chrome #85114
    arch-wasm, test-enhancement, area-Build-mono
  • Expose setting CPU SamplingProfiler rate #83635
    area-Tracing-coreclr, community-contribution
  • [wasi] implement ICU bundling #85049
    area-Build-mono, os-wasi, 8.0.0
  • [wasm-mt] Support async JS interop on threadpool threads #84494
    arch-wasm, area-Threading-mono
  • [browser][non-icu] `HybridGlobalization` checking for prefix/suffix #85093
    arch-wasm, area-System.Globalization
  • Vectorize IEnumerable<T>.Sum where possible #84519
    area-System.Linq, community-contribution
  • [RISC-V][JIT] JIT/CodeGenBringUpTest #84748
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, community-contribution
  • Almost complete sync of logic for generating DAM/RUC reflection access warnings between ILLink and NativeAOT #84770
    area-NativeAOT-coreclr, 8.0.0
  • Add TargetHostName to QuicConnection #84976
    new-api-needs-documentation, area-System.Net.Quic
  • JIT: Support some assignment decomposition in physical promotion #85105
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • Adding TimeProvider CreateCancellationTokenSource extension method #85131
    new-api-needs-documentation, area-System.DateTime, 8.0.0
  • DateTimeParse: accept all white space chars in the format string for DateTimeStyles Allow White #85102
    area-System.Globalization, community-contribution, needs-author-action, 8.0.0
  • AssemblyBuilder.Save add custom attributes handling. #84580
    area-System.Reflection, new-api-needs-documentation
  • [mono] fix two call get_default_jit_mm make hotreload work in non default alc #84247
    area-EnC-mono, community-contribution
  • [PERF] Remove pipeline dependencies and steps for running Maui Mobile #85074
    area-Infrastructure

entry.title: dotnet/runtimelab - Issues & Pull Requests - 2023-04-21
entry.content:
Issues

Updated

  • NativeAOT-LLVM: export for NativeAOT_StaticInitialization automatically #2259

PullRequests

Created

  • NativeAOT-LLVM: map Ilc opimisation settings to emcc #2263
  • NativeAOT-LLVM: Export NativeAOT_StaticInitialization implicitly #2262
  • NativeAOT-LLVM: Remove ILLink target #2261

Updated

  • NativeAOT-LLVM: Merge to apr 15 #2255

entry.title: dotnet/sdk - Issues & Pull Requests - 2023-04-21
entry.content:
Issues

Closed

  • `dotnet add package` is too verbose #31946
  • Follow up on failing WASM AOT tests #31491
  • [8.0 preview 3] NuGet package validation fails when UseArtifactsOutput=true #31882
    8.0.1xx
  • dotnet --info hitting /lib64/libstdc++.so.6: version `GLIBCXX_3.4.20' not found on Latest net8.0 #31893
  • GenAPI produces incorrect explicit interface implementations with new keyword #31774

Updated

  • Application executable is not marked as Windows 10 compatible in the default manifest #12904
    Backlog
  • [GenAPI] setup the Simplifier to produce fully qualified type names. #30538
  • GenAPI can generate ambiguous call to base constructor #31655
  • Better support for non-standard `$(Configuration)` names #31918

PullRequests

Created

  • #30336 Default Dotnet Tool to Run on Latest Runtime - Build time change #31957
    untriaged, Area-Tools
  • [automated] Merge branch 'release/7.0.4xx' => 'main' #31956
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • Use 'artifacts' instead of `.artifacts` for default artifacts path #31955
    untriaged, Area-NetSDK
  • Change the workloads txt file name to KnownWorkloadManifests.txt. #31949
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • Fix TFM path for Test CLI package #31945
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • Remove Unnecessary Check In RazorSourceGenerator Targets #31921
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged

Merged

  • Wasm SDK packed as a nuget package #31519
    Area-Infrastructure
  • [automated] Merge branch 'release/7.0.4xx' => 'main' #31883
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • Re-enable Blazor AoT tests #31941
    untriaged, Area-AspNetCore
  • Fix outer build artifacts output path #31919
    untriaged, Area-ApiCompat
  • Invoke MakeDir task before invoking Touch task #31906
    untriaged

Updated

  • Updating the minimum VS version #31720
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • [release/7.0.4xx] include container tasks and targets directly to `Microsoft.NET.Publish.Sdk` #31432
    Area-Containers
  • Add a PostAction to support modifying Json files in CLI templates #29880
    Area-dotnet new

entry.title: dotnet/csharplang - Issues & Pull Requests - 2023-04-21
entry.content:
Issues

Updated

  • Disallow interfaces with static virtual members as type arguments #5955

PullRequests

Created

  • Lifetime annotation notation #7140
  • Fix typos in low-level-struct-improvements.md #7139

Merged

  • Update README.md #7138
  • Update README.md #7137
  • Update primary-constructors.md #7136

Updated

  • Add "Inline array type syntax" section to inline-arrays.md #7130

entry.title: dotnet/roslyn - Issues & Pull Requests - 2023-04-21
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • Pattern-captured variable has a wrong value in C# 11 #67923
  • Completion deletes preceding end of line when using hard tabs #67916
    17.7 P1
  • Unable to compile project with large amount of grpc proto messages and services #67912
  • Expression `(FunctionPointerAlias)&FunctionName` raises large amout of crashes #67911
  • IDE0051 false-positive for private copy constructor in records #67910
  • GeneratedCodeAnalysisFlagsMap is slow being segmented dictionary #67909
  • PDB Tests fail on servicing branches #67908

Closed

  • Simplifier.ReduceAsync reduces default expression removing relevant type arguments #67867
  • Type `T[]*` reports parser error #65429
    17.6
  • The compiler should include the URL in the command line output #47310
    17.7

PullRequests

Created

  • Dev/dibarbet/17 3 servicing #67922
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • Hard code segment constants for common type sizes #67921
    Area-Compilers, untriaged
  • EnC: Implements support for generic type/method updates #67918
    Area-IDE, Interactive-EnC, untriaged
  • Avoid stack overflow due to deep recursion on long chain of calls. #67913
    Area-Compilers, untriaged

Merged

  • Merge 17.0-vs-deps into 17.2 #67920
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • Fix servicing builds #67907
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • Revert "Update ICSharpCode.Decompiler to 7.2.1.6856 (#67875)" #67919
    Area-Compilers, untriaged, Next
  • Merge 'main' into `InlineArrays` #67915
    Area-Compilers, untriaged
  • Merge main to features/CollectionLiterals #67917
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • Fix incorrect oversimplification of 'default(T)' arguments #67893
    Area-IDE, untriaged, Next
  • Filter out configure & suppress code fixers when it is not in VS LSP #67885
    Area-IDE, untriaged, Next
  • Initial pass at enabling prebuilt detection #67645
    Area-Infrastructure, Community, untriaged, Next
  • Optimize some SegmentedArrayHelper members for JIT #67558
    Area-IDE, Community, untriaged, Next
  • Add additional information to an argument exception #67899
    Area-Compilers, Next
  • Implement element access for inline array types #67830
    Area-Compilers, untriaged, New Feature - Inline Arrays
  • Parse pointer to arrays #65432
    Area-Compilers, Community, Next
  • Include diagnostic help URL in output #67836
    Area-Compilers, Next

Updated

  • Merge release/dev17.2 to release/dev17.3 #67924
    Area-Infrastructure, auto-merge
  • Work to unify threading concepts between Workspace and ProjectSystemProjectFactory (part1) #67522
    Area-IDE, untriaged
  • Interceptors: handle duplicates, additional signature validation, etc. #67786
    Area-Compilers, C# 12.0
  • Update code lens cache to use the syntax version #67884
    Area-IDE, untriaged
  • Remove the ` bool IsUnsafe(this TypeSymbol type)` method #67831
    Area-Compilers, 17.7
  • Implement ISymbol.LocationList #67881
    Area-Compilers, untriaged
  • Flow the telemetry update change from feature branch to 17.0 release branch #67901
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • Collection literals natural type #67364
  • Use non-void type for `BoundAwaitOperator` in VB statement #67822
    Language-VB, Area-Compilers, Feature - IOperation, 17.7
  • Improve detection of receiver cloning in ref safety analysis #67736
    Area-Compilers, untriaged, New Language Feature - Ref Fields
  • Add `IsExplicitExtension` #67850
    Area-Compilers, C# 12.0

entry.title: dotnet/aspnetcore - Issues & Pull Requests - 2023-04-21
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • Perf regression: ApiCrudListProducts #47830
  • Perf improvement: mapaction #47829
  • Documentation doesn't speak of required properties for Blazor parameters #47824
  • Make ProblemDetailsDefaults public #47822

Closed

  • Is there a way I can compile small piece of C# code to wasm #46344
    Discussions
  • Default localization isn't working within Blazor app #47827
  • Perf regression: mapaction #47819
  • Under certain circumstances, the HttpLogging middleware does not follow the ResponseBodyLogLimit setting #46703
    8.0-preview4
  • AspNetCore.SignalR is reconnecting from client (angular 7) and then unable to receive latest message #47694
  • FeatureCollection can throw NRE with structs #46939
    8.0-preview4
  • The runtime<->aspnetcore shared src is out of sync #18943
  • [Question/Issue?] Blazor Server CORS ? #47690
  • Allow to define variable within Virtualize component #47818
  • Configure or disable timeouts on long running requests #46818
    8.0-preview4

PullRequests

Created

  • Added TryAddPolicyRegistry extension methods for IPolicyRegistry #47821
    area-runtime, community-contribution

Merged

  • Check for 'null' arguments in HttpContextServerVariableExtensions.GetServerVariable #47828
    area-runtime, 8.0-preview4
  • Make HttpLogging middleware endpoint aware #47595
    area-runtime, feature-middleware, 8.0-preview4
  • [main] (deps): Bump src/submodules/googletest from `12a5852` to `a5308bb` #47825
    area-infrastructure, 8.0-preview4
  • [main] (deps): Bump src/submodules/spa-templates from `3c41fe2` to `d42267c` #47826
    area-infrastructure, 8.0-preview4
  • Fix nullref when getting struct from feature collection and it isn't present #47795
    area-runtime, 8.0-preview4
  • Fix incorrect paragraph elements in XML docs #47817
    area-runtime, 8.0-preview4
  • Add RequiresUnreferencedCode attribute to AddMvc calls. #47816
    area-mvc, area-web-frameworks, 8.0-preview4
  • Write log message for matched fallback routes #47798
    area-runtime, 8.0-preview4

Updated

  • [SignalR] Seamless Reconnect #47748
    area-signalr
  • Obsolete and replace ISystemClock in Security, Identity #47472 #47717
    breaking-change, area-security, needs-breaking-change-announcement
  • Add analyzer/codefixer to use AddAuthorizationBuilder #47428
    area-security, community-contribution
  • [release/7.0] Don't generate RequestBody for parameters when disabledInferredBody is true #47807
    Servicing-consider, feature-openapi, area-minimal, 7.0.x
  • Localized file check-in by OneLocBuild Task: Build definition ID 1159: Build ID 2164230 #47784
    area-mvc
  • Unified app model routing #47759
    area-blazor
  • [Blazor] Add support for accessing the request body form parameters #47814
    area-blazor
  • [release/7.0] Web.ProjectTemplates: exclude 'Program.cs' from all templates that replace it. #47114
    area-mvc, 7.0.x
  • Add metrics to rate limiting #47758
    area-runtime
  • [Blazor] Adds support for server side rendered forms (without a body) #47716
    area-blazor
  • Update SDK #47540
    area-infrastructure, area-signalr
  • Enable AOT template tests #47247
    area-mvc, area-web-frameworks, 8.0-preview4
  • RDG metadata generation based on endpoint response type. #47741
    area-runtime

entry.title: dotnet/maui - Issues & Pull Requests - 2023-04-21
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • Tv remote control OK button not working in CollectionView #14716
  • WinUI TitleView is offset incorrectly from the top of the page #14715
    .NET 8
  • AbsoluteLayout works in preview, breaks when restarting the app. #14713
  • [Android] Button text alignment inconsistencies #14712
  • [Android] CollectionView scrolling is not smooth and bounces #14711
  • [Android] CollectionView height does not immediately update on screen rotation #14710
  • MAUI: button not working in custom element (in derived class) after overriding "ArrangeOverride" #14709
  • [Android] Investigate SearchBar presentation in horizontal screen orientation #14708
  • Cursor position is at the beginning of entry/editor #14707
  • MeasureInvalided of the Parent is not being invoked when a Child invalidates itself #14706
  • Get Userlocation from map control #14700
  • [iOS] SwipeView fails when wrapping an Editor control #14699
  • Setting main page from modal async page does nothing on Android #14697

Closed

  • To can check if location is enabled #14682
  • WKUIDelegate.RunJavaScriptTextInputPanel bad implementation #14695
  • Getting a XamlC error when trying to use common xmlns only in XAML without x:Name #7503
    Backlog

PullRequests

Created

  • Don't measure text spans if type is HTML #14705
    area/controls 🎮, backport/suggested
  • Update All (most) BindableProperty XML docs #14704
    area/docs 📓, t/housekeeping ♻︎
  • Correctly re-apply font formatting to HTML text #14701
    area/controls 🎮, backport/suggested

Updated

  • [iOS] Clear BindingContext when cell is queued for reuse #14619
  • [iOS] Fix Label Truncation on iOS with HorizontalOptions #14453
    platform/iOS 🍎, area/controls 🎮, control-label
  • Switch to AppWindowTitleBar From SetTitleBar #14517
  • "Rename" Windows' Graphics APIs to match with the rest of the platforms #12818
    t/breaking 💥, platform/windows 🪟, area/drawing ✏️, needs-breaking-change-doc-created
  • [uitests] Work for get appium uitests with CI #14488
    area/infrastructure 🏗️
  • Support both Update and Include for maui #14576
    area/setup 🪄
  • Added ICommandMapper for extension methods #14545
  • Update mappers instead of replacing field values #13836
    t/breaking 💥, do-not-merge, needs-breaking-change-doc-created
  • [net7.0] Make MAUI into a workload based on NuGet packs #14331
    area/setup 🪄
  • Style specificity #13818
    area/Xaml </>
